      @PatchMapping("/{id-appointment}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity patchAppointment(@Valid @PathVariable("id-appointment") @Valid String idAppointment, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid RequestPatchAppointmentDto appointment)
